item.description:
The Frog Pond is closing for the season next weekend! Let's go skating one more time before packing our skates away.

We'll meet at Pho Hoa for lunch and then head to the Frog Pond for skating afterward.

12:00 PM Lunch at Pho Hoa
2:00 PM Skating at the Boston Common Frog Pond

For those who haven't been to the Frog Pond, entrance fee is $4 and skate rental is $8. You can bring your own skates too. It is in the middle of the Boston Commons (84 Beacon Street, Boston, MA 02108).

I'll make reservations for the restaurant on Friday. If you plan to skip lunch and go straight to skating, please note that in your response so I'll know how many seats to reserve. Thanks!

Hope you can make it!
item.why: Last chance of the season to go skating at the Frog Pond ... and delicious pho.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Vietnamese Lunch and Ice Skating at the Frog Pond
